name: postgresus
description: Postgresus is a lightweight multi-tenant PostgreSQL management platform with a web UI for creating and managing databases, users, and access. It streamlines multi-db setups for developers and hosting providers.

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Quickly create database users with customizable permissions and access controls

features.title: Database Creation
features.description: Spin up new databases with predefined templates and configurations

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Manage user permissions and roles across multiple databases and tenants

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Administer databases through a lightweight, responsive web UI without command-line access

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Schedule and manage database backups with retention policies
